name: A. Two Vessels
statement:
You have two vessels with water. The first vessel contains a grams of
water, and the second vessel contains b grams of water. Both vessels are
very large and can hold any amount of water.You also have an empty cup
that can hold c grams of water.In one move, you can scoop c grams of
water from any vessel and pour it into vessel. Note that the mass of
water poured in one move .What is the minimum number of moves required
to make the masses of water in the vessels equal? Note that you cannot
perform any actions other than the described moves.
